description.value: Long years of success have not only shown you where your limits lie, they've expanded them. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would cause you to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]. Whenever you attempt such a save, you can spend a Mythic Point do so at mythic proficiency. The bonus increases to +3 at 18th level.

publication.title: Pathfinder #219: Lord of the Trinity Star
